gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Suns 118, Heat 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Suns defeated the Heat, 118-105. Eric Gordon recorded 23 points, five assists, and four rebounds for the Suns, with Devin Booker adding 22 points, eight rebounds, and seven assists in the victory. Jimmy Butler tallied 26 points, eight rebounds, and four assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Suns improve to 27-20, while the Heat fall to 24-23.
